briefDescription: I am a fresh graduate with a background of software engineering. I am currently looking for oppotunities and currently working on personal projects as a hobby. During my free times, I enjoyed travelling and gardening

highlights: Improved the performance by 23% in the last year
Gained an increase of unique visitors by 66% in 2020
Developed a filtering mechanism for the catalog page

educations.description: Graduated from a 3-years bachelor programme with a CGPA of 3.2 (total of 24 units) . Majoring in Web Development and had completed a Final Year Project of creating an HTML Game using Javascript, CSS and HTML
A one-year program as a part of a requirement to qualify into a bachelor programe in Australia

projects.name: Project ABC
highlights: Delivering a website, mainly acting as a landing page that is packed with information
Integrate a bunch of jQuery methods such as animation, transition and interaction

projects.name: Project Doodle
highlights: Analysed classical arts from all around the world including their aspects, monetary gains and cultural background using analytical tools
Part of a research project in the Arts and Culture Faculty

skills.name: Web/Mobile Development
skills.description: Proficient with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Able to convert designs into web in no time!

skills.name: Machine Learning
skills.description: Have a deep understanding and able to do the work across entire ML cycle

reviews.quote: Talented and always show great effort in delivering high quality work
Dedicated and passionate, and willing to learn anything
